committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: A bill to designate the Federal Building and United States Courthouse at 450 Golden Gate Avenue, San Francisco, California, as the Phillip Burton Federal Building and United States Courthouse.

summary.text: Designates the Federal Building and U.S. Courthouse in San Francisco, California, as the Phillip Burton Federal Building and U.S. Courthouse.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal Building and United States Courthouse at 450 Golden Gate Avenue, San Francisco, California, as the Phillip Burton Federal Building and United States Courthouse.
